failure.description: Queue split packets to send at a timed interval on a separate thread

success.description: Send split packets out per frame without a queued thread

network.split_packets.net_queued_packet_.name: Queued packet thread
network.split_packets.net_queued_packet_.description: Whether to queue split packets on another thread

network.split_packets.net_splitrate.description: How many packets to split per frame

values.description: Simply capture the mouse. Use unless there are problems.
Try to work around issues with mouse capturing. Might help prevent clicking outside the TF2 window.

mouse.m_limitedcapture_workaround.name: Mouse capture issues workarounds
mouse.m_limitedcapture_workaround.description: Whether to work around mouse capture issues.

values.description: Take the average of the change in mouse position changes over 2 frames. Makes mouse input smoother if FPS varies a lot.
Try to disable acceleration, filtering and any other effects applied to mouse input by the system. Does not completely work on Mac OS.
Use mouse input processed by the operating system.

mouse.m_rawinput.name: Raw mouse input
mouse.m_rawinput.description: Whether to use raw mouse input.

values.description: Accelerate by `min(m_customaccel_max, pow(raw_mouse_delta, m_customaccel_exponent) * m_customaccel_scale + sensitivity)`.
TODO is it m_yaw for x and m_pitch for y or the other way
values.descirption_: Custom mouse acceleration scaled on the x and y axes by `m_yaw` and `m_pitch` respectively.

mouse.accel.m_customaccel_scale.name: Custom mouse acceleration multiplier
mouse.accel.m_customaccel_scale.description: Value used in custom mouse acceleration formulas as a coefficient. For example, a value of `0.5` would halve the amount of acceleration.

mouse.accel.m_customaccel_max.name: Custom mouse acceleration upper limit
mouse.accel.m_customaccel_max.description: Maximum value of the custom mouse acceleration.

mouse.accel.m_customaccel_exponent.name: Custom mouse acceleration exponent
mouse.accel.m_customaccel_exponent.description: Value used in custom mouse acceleration formulas as an exponent. Small changes effect the acceleration by a lot.

steam_controller.sc_pitch_sensitivity.name: Steam controller extra pitch sensitivity
steam_controller.sc_pitch_sensitivity.description: Additional sensitivity for the pitch (up-down) axis of the steam controller.

steam_controller.sc_yaw_sensitivity.name: Steam controller extra yaw sensitivity
steam_controller.sc_yaw_sensitivity.description: Additional sensitivity for the yaw (left-right) axis of the steam controller.

go-kart.tf_halloween_kart_pitch_fast_fol.name: Go-kart camera fast follow speed
go-kart.tf_halloween_kart_pitch_fast_fol.description: Speed with which the camera follows a player in a go-kart when they are moving fast.

go-kart.tf_halloween_kart_pitch_slow_fol.name: Go-kart camera slow follow speed
go-kart.tf_halloween_kart_pitch_slow_fol.description: Speed with which the camera follows a player in a go-kart when they are moving slowly.

console.filter.con_filter_text_out.name: Console message blacklist
console.filter.con_filter_text_out.description: Filter out console messages containing a given string. Used to block console spam.
